GSD.description:
scsi: pm8001: Fix use-after-free for aborted TMF sas_task

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.25 by commit 3c334cdfd94945b8edb94022a0371a8665b17366. For more details please see the references link.
